sources.title: Zorro Rides Again (1937) 12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
Exclusive PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 12-Chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: John Carroll, Noah Beery, Duncan Renaldo
Writer: Johnston McCulley (Character of Zorro)
Directors: William Witney, John English

More than a hundred years after Zorro rode into the South West, a modern-day masked avenger appears, a direct descendant of Don Diego Vega. This is the 1st of five Zorro serials produced by Republic Pictures and the first of the historic collaborations by William Witney and John English. 

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00 PizzaFLIX Introduction
2:25       CHAPTER 1: Death from the Sky 
32:07     CHAPTER 2: The Fatal Minute
50:07     CHAPTER 3: Juggernaut
1:06:23  CHAPTER 4: Unmasked
1:22:42  CHAPTER 5: Sky Pirates
1:39:37  CHAPTER 6: The Fatal Shot
1:55:40  CHAPTER 7: Burning Embers
2:11:11  CHAPTER 8: Plunge of Peril 
2:28:21  CHAPTER 9: Tunnel of Terror  
2:45:33  CHAPTER 10: Trapped
3:02:58  CHAPTER 12: Right of Way
3:18:46  CHAPTER 13: Retribution
3:34:40 Please Subscribe!.

metadata.Plot: The California-Yucatan Railroad, being built for the good of Mexico, is under siege by a gang of terrorists hoping to force its sale; no one can prove their connection to profiteer Marsden. Manuel Vega, aged co-owner, calls in the aid of his nephew James, great-grandson of the original Zorro. Alas, James seems more adept at golf than derring-do; but after he arrives, Zorro rides again! Can one black-clad man on horseback defeat a gang supplied with airplanes and machine guns?
metadata.Writer: Barry Shipman, John Rathmell, Franklin Adreon
metadata.Actors: John Carroll, Noah Beery, Richard Alexander
